# applying(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a transformed copy of the value.

## Declaration

```swift
func applying(_ transform: ProjectiveTransform3DFloat) -> Transform
```

## Parameters

- **transform**: A transform the function applies to the value.
title: applying(_:)
